children.text:
How to use?


This application can be used in emergency situations or alert, such as walking on streets or highways with low visibility, changing a tire at night, while riding a bicycle.

It can also be used for entertainment for parties, discos, techno or to amaze your friends. Use this application responsibly.

Instructions:
1. - Press the Start button to start the police lights.
2. - Touch anywhere to activate the options menu.
3. - You can also activate the options menu by touching the Android Menu Key.
4. - In the options menu you can change the style of the lights and activate the siren sound.

We hope that this application is very useful for you. The authors of this application are not responsible for any misuse that can be given to it.
If you have any problem/questions/suggestions or want to translate this app to your languaje, contact me:
